title: Assassin
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
War is overdue
The time has come for you
To shoot your leaders down
Join forces underground
[Chorus]
Lose control
An increasing pace
Warped and bewitched
In time to erase
Whatever they say
These people are torn
Wild and bereft
Assassin is born, yeah
[Post-Chorus]
Woah, yeah!
(Aim! Shoot! Kill your leaders!)
(Aim! Kill them all!)
[Verse 2]
Oppose and disagree
Destroy demonocracy
[Chorus]
Lose control
An increasing pace
Warped and bewitched
In time to erase
Whatever they say
These people are torn
Wild and bereft
Assassin is born, yeah

[Outro]
Go!
